name: Endless Car Chase
description:
Endless Car Chase is a perfect game for all types of players and ages, due to its simplicity and cleanliness in the design and in the gameplay. Easy to understand, but not easy to play.

In Endless Car Chase you have a simple goal, escape from the police cars that will chase you constantly.

It seems simple, but there are certain inducements that make the game so much more fun:

-Not only you can escape from the police for speed, but you have the possibility (and you must do if you want to take a long time) to cause the police cars to be shot down, that you will achieve with maneuvers fair enough for the police to crash against an obstacle while imitating them in an attempt to follow you

-The points of the game are based on the time that you keep going, and in the end, the main objective of the game is to get the maximum possible points. Your highest score will be saved in the game, so go ahead and beat your own records

-The design of the game is very simple and clear, without distractions. This will help you to concentrate simply on the game and its mechanics.

You will not regret playing this game, as it will give you great moments of fun.
